comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content: C. Murvin Wood born 9 January 1885 Bible Grove IL www.earlyaviators.com/ewood3.htm

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: puzzlemaster: thanks for the information which will be useful to update our records. However, there seems to be a discrepancy in the year he was born. You have January 9, 1885 while in the same link that you provided it has his birth date as being 1887, www.earlyaviators.com/ewood.htm. Where did you find the date of his birth? Thanks.

comment.author: 10771167@N00
comment._content:
I got his birth date from his passport application of 1913 which I found in US Passport Applications 1789-1925 at ancestry.com  The application, which is signed by Mr Wood, gives his birth date as January 9, 1885.  The application appears to have been filled out by someone other than the signatory, however, so perhaps it is not as reliable as it first appears.

So I went back and searched for more evidence.   The 1900 US Census of Bible Grove IL includes a Clyde M Wood, son of Leander Wood, who was born in January 1885.  The 1910 Census of the same place also has " C M Wood, aged 25, teacher" who appears to be the same individual. 

Keep the pictures coming Pete.  They're much appreciated.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
10771167@N00
comment._content: Thanks Lifeasdaddy.   The internet makes all possible.
